=======
details
=======

.. js:attribute:: details

**domain**: client 

**language**: javascript

**class** :doc:`Item class </refs/client/item_api>`

Description
===========

Lists all 
:doc:`detail </refs/client/detail_api>`
objects of the item.

See also
========

:doc:`Details </programming/data/details>`

:doc:`each_detail <m_each_detail>`
